title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: If you have any questions, they are usually answered here!

first.question: I'm looking for an internship abroad, can you help me ?
first.answer: Of course ! All you have to do is send us your CV and cover letter with at least 3 pieces of information (desired destination, preferred field, length of work experience). We will then put you in touch with our partner companies, who are looking for a profile like yours !

second.question: What are the payment methods ?
second.answer: You can pay by credit card (Visa, CB, MasterCard...).

third.question: Are Expat Facilities' services accessible to all ?
third.answer: The services that Expat Facilities offers are mainly intended for French students who wish to study abroad, to learn a foreign language or to do a gap year.
